DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Immunogenicity Safety Hantavax Healthy Adult
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial design multicenter , non-comparative , open-label clinical trial . This trial conduct , write informed consent form voluntary agreement , subject hantavax vaccination history time screen . Investigator product administrate 0 , 1 , 2 , 13 month . For antibody test , Sampling conduct pre-dose ( T0 ) , 28 day 2nd vaccination ( 3rd vaccination , T1 ) , 28 day 3rd vaccination ( T2 ) 11 month 3rd vaccination ( booster vaccination , T3 ) , 28 day booster vaccination ( T4 ) , 2 month booster vaccination ( T5 ) 4 month booster vaccination ( T6 ) . Also , completion booster vaccination antibody retention duration observe subject antibody conduct five-year follow-up survey conduct , antibody test every year . In conclusion , sample conduct 12 month ( T7 ) , 24 month ( T8 ) , 36months ( T9 ) , 48 month ( T10 ) , 60 month ( T11 ) booster vaccination . However , follow-up survey terminate antibody titer determine negative neutralizing antibody test fluorescent antibody technique .
